## Dashboard.render() method

Render stdout

Signature:

```typescript
render(Component: any, title?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                   |
| --------- | ------ | ----------------------------- |
| Component | any    | Component or string to render |
| title     | string | Title to render               |

Returns:

void

void
